attributes.action: Make the 1911 census more freely available to researchers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By reducing the cost and use of credits per view. If a researcher has to use 10 credits to view a transcript, and then uses another 30 credits to view the original census page, the original 10 credits should be credited back to the viewers account, thus saving their credits towards another search.
